name: ZombieXP
description:
EARLY ACCESS VERSION

v0.2.5 (Barebones Edition)

ZombieXP is a top down arcade shooter that will push you to your limits. Blast through swarms of the undead, save up your coins to upgrade your arsenal, and see how long you can survive. 

(this is the first public release of the game. any feedback is appreciated! thanks for stopping by)

Made by MegaDisk Games, several assets subject to change

PixelFJ 8pt font by Flashjunior
